alert.note: Alert for Essex; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Orleans and northwestern Essex Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Holland, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public report of pea size hail. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norton, Morgan, Warren Gore, Warners Grant, Holland, Canaan, Averys Gore, Averill, Charleston, Derby, Beecher Falls, West Charleston and Morgan Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
